name: Climate change management simulator
description:
A game I made a few years ago for a school project. It took about 2 days to complete, and it's a wholesale knock-off of heavily inspired by Reigns. You play as The Government as it attempts to balance the interests of all interested parties while preventing the planet from burning.

Positives: I'm surprised to look back on some of the pixel art I did, considering the short time span. Mother Nature's clothes and face, in particular. The overall aesthetic and polish is pretty good too.

Negatives: It's fairly one-note, very content-light, and clearly rushed. I also got the peace sign wrong and instead drew the Mercedes logo, so there's that. There's no sound, either.
